Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
randoomThis class for random number generation
VVLayerClass VVLayer is formed from a collection of neurons. Many layers form a network. The class contains a pointer for pointing to an array of neurons. It contains all the details which makes the layer complete
VVNetworkThis class is a predefined network using the FeedForward Backpropagation algorithm
VVNeuronClass VVNeuron is the most fundamental unit of the network
